en:
"I am from Syria, and I have been in Germany for five years. It's going well - I have a family and three children. My wife just got accepted to a German class.

I live in Freital. It's a small city. People are sometimes unfriendly. My wife wears a headscarf and has been harassed when she is out in the city. Once a man with tattoos came up to her. My wife was afraid, but he just wanted to help her with the stroller."
